name: io.github.asusevski/opendota-mcp-server
description: A Model Context Protocol (MCP) server implementation for accessing OpenDota API data. This server enables LLMs and AI assistants to retrieve real-time Dota 2 statistics, match data, player information, and more through a standard interface.

tools.name: get_player_by_id
tools.description: Retrieve player information by account ID

tools.name: get_player_recent_matches
tools.description: Get recent matches for a player

tools.name: get_match_data
tools.description: Get detailed data for a specific match

tools.name: get_player_win_loss
tools.description: Get win/loss statistics for a player

tools.name: get_player_heroes
tools.description: Get a player's most played heroes

tools.name: get_player_peers
tools.description: Get players who have played with a specified player

tools.name: get_heroes
tools.description: Get list of all Dota 2 heroes

tools.name: get_player_wordcloud
tools.description: Get most common words used by player in chat

tools.name: get_match_heroes
tools.description: Get heroes played in a specific match
